educations.schoolName: George Mason University School of Law

headline: Summer Associate at Richards, Layton & Finger, PA

positions.description:
Serve as point Statistician for all Litigation related data requests. Analyze FOIA, Congressional and Governmental requests for ICE Enforcement and Removal Operations statistics. 
Collect and synthesize ICE Enforcement and Removal Operations Data for multiple customers including fellow Government agencies as well as external entities.
Build queries and prepare reports to provide data in response to varying requests from Congressional Inquiries to FOIA requests.
positions.title: Statistician

positions.description:
Analyzed and interpreted data from scientific studies to provide insight to the intelligence community regarding trends in drug purity, production, and movement. 
Participated in inter-agency meetings to coordinate research and analysis conducted to provide worldwide drug production estimates.
positions.title: Statistician

positions.description: Assisted in the design, implementation, analysis and reporting of several Human-In-The-Loop research studies designed to assist in the integration of UAS in to the National Airspace. Co-Authored multiple reports detailing the production, execution, analysis, and findings of these Human-In-The-Loop research studies. Analyzed proprietary data to create final reports and briefings for agency and industry sponsors.
positions.title: Statistician

positions.description: Worked individually and in small groups with students struggling in their regular mathematics classes.
positions.title: Middle School Math Tutor

positions.description: Instructed High School Algebra II and Pre-Calculus Courses. Instructed Algebra I for English Language Learners.
positions.title: High School Math Teacher
